fields.name: activeTopics
fields.description: A list of group active topics.

fields.name: allowMemberPhotoUploads
fields.description: Indicates if members are allowed to upload photos.

fields.name: canAddPhotos
fields.description: Shows current user's permission to upload photos to this group.

fields.name: city
fields.description: A city where a group is located.

fields.name: country
fields.description: A country where a group is located.

fields.name: customMemberLabel
fields.description: What this group calls its members

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of a group.

fields.name: duesSettings
fields.description: Active group membership dues settings. Available only when dues are enabled in the group.

fields.name: emailAnnounceAddress
fields.description: an email address, representing an Organizer(s) of this Meetup Group. Meant to use for Organizer Announcements

fields.name: events
fields.description: Events of the group

fields.name: featuredEventPhotos
fields.description: Returns a list of recently used event photos

fields.name: foundedDate
fields.description: Date and time of when a group was created.

fields.name: groupAnalytics
fields.description: Groups analytics, only available for groups which are part of a pro network

fields.name: id
fields.description: Group unique identifier.

fields.name: isMember
fields.description: Checks whether the specified member is in this group.

fields.name: isPrimaryOrganizer
fields.description: Checks whether the current member is the primary organizer of this group

fields.name: isPrivate
fields.description: If the group is private

fields.name: joinMode
fields.description: Join mode for new group members.

fields.name: keyGroupPhoto
fields.description: A group featured (cover) photo.

fields.name: lat
fields.description: A latitude of a group location.

fields.name: link
fields.description: Link for the group on meetup.com

fields.name: lon
fields.description: A longitude of a group location.

fields.name: membershipMetadata
fields.description: The authenticated member's membership within this group if any

fields.name: memberships
fields.description: Members in this group

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of a group.

fields.name: needsPhoto
fields.description: A flag indicating whether new members are required to upload a photo to their group profile in order to join this group.

fields.name: needsQuestions
fields.description: A flag indicating whether new members are required to answer organizer's questions in order to join this group.

fields.name: organizer
fields.description: The primary organizer of the group. Null if the group is leaderless.

fields.name: proJoinDate
fields.description: A date when group joined pro network

fields.name: proNetwork
fields.description: If a group is a part of a Pro network, the network properties.

fields.name: questions
fields.description: If a group requires new members to answer questions, a list of questions.

fields.name: socialNetworks
fields.description: A list of links to this group in social networks.

fields.name: sponsors
fields.description: List of the sponsors for the group

fields.name: state
fields.description: A state, county or province where a group is located.

fields.name: stats
fields.description: Statistics about group members.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Group status.

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: Timezone identifier as used by the IANA timezone database, for example: "US/Eastern", "Asia/Calcutta"

fields.name: topicCategory
fields.description: A group topic category.

fields.name: urlname
fields.description: Group unique URL path.

fields.name: venues
fields.description: Recently used in-person venues

fields.name: video
fields.description: Group featured video.

fields.name: welcomeBlurb
fields.description: A group welcome message.

fields.name: zip
fields.description: A zip code of a group location.
